*k3 p2 repeat from * to eor decreases round 1 *k3 k2tog repeat from * to eor 30 sts round 2 k round 3 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to eor 20 sts round 4 *k2tog repeat from * to eor 10 sts finishing cut yarn leaving an 12 30 5 cm tail using yarn needle thread tail through remaining stitches pull to tighten but leave an opening through which to stuff your pumpkin stuff your pumpkin when you ve stuffed it to your desired plumpness rotundness chunkiness insert your stem of choice pick up the yarn needle and weave the tail through a few stitches you may need to take a few additional stitches to sew up the hole around the stem push needle through the center of the pumpin and then out bottom center pull tight to create a little dip around the stem use the tail to take a few stitches and close up the hole at the bottom of the pumpkin weave in the end of the tail weave in the end of your cast on tail too insert some natural decoration around the stem of your pumpkins i used wild berries fall flowers and herbs tuck them in the pumpkin around the stem you can use hot glue if you want to make sure everything sticks together gift giving idea tie a tea bag or two or three around the stem of the pumpkin put the pumpkin in a small cellophane bag and tie with a ribbon add a greeting card if you desire and you have a cute happy fall gift pumpkin party 09292023 copyright lisa uotinen 2023 you
